Hello,

Thanks for checking in. This doesn't appear to be an issue anymore after the Tech from Netwrix remoted in and made a few changes. If there are any issues that arise I will submit a new ticket.

Justin

From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: Monday, November 4, 2024 5:08 PM
To: Packard, Justin <justin.packard@albaec.com>
Subject: RE: 00418123 - Server intermittently with hang

CAUTION: This email originated from outside Albany International Corp. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hello Justin,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00418123. We haven't heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you're still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We're here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00418123
Ticket Subject: Server intermittently with hang
Ticket Details: While working within the web interface of the EPP server doing functions the response with freeze and then the webpage with provide a message saying the page is not responding.
The system appears to be in good health by storage and such that I can tell from the web interface before it locks up on me.

Thank you!

Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer
